source.text: Endomorphisms, group actions, and Inn(G) ≅ G/Z(G) (standard group theory; relates to Smith §2.x)

statements: End(G) is a monoid under composition; units(End(G)) = Aut(G).
A group action is a hom G → Sym(X); left-regular and conjugation are canonical actions.
Z(G) = center; mapping gZ(G) ↦ conj_g gives an isomorphism G/Z(G) ≅ Inn(G).
